name: Cinderclaw Gauntlet
desc:
This sharp-taloned +1 striking spiked gauntlet appears to have been crafted from dragon scales, with claws built from iron. In addition to the typical weapon traits, a Cinderclaw gauntlet has the versatile S trait.

On a critical hit, the Cinderclaw gauntlet deals an additional 1d6 fire damage.
criticalHint: On a critical hit, the Cinderclaw gauntlet deals an additional |dice=1d6 Fire| 1d6 fire damage.

activities.desc: The creature you hit must succeed at a DC 19 Fortitude save or be sickened 1 by the gauntlet's acrid smoke. Creatures that don't need to breathe are immune.
activities.name: Cinderclaw Gauntlet
activities.trigger: Your attack roll with the Cinderclaw gauntlet is a critical success
